name: Messari
title: Justin Sun's Vision The Future of Stablecoins on TRON on Fully Diluted with Messari CEO, Eric Turner
text:
Synopsis
Justin Sun predicts massive growth for stablecoins on the TRON network, projecting $80-100 billion in stablecoin volume and $50-100 billion in daily transactions by 2026, driven by institutional collaboration and improving regulatory environment.

Key Insights
- TRON network expects stablecoin volume to reach $80 billion by 2025
- Projected stablecoin volume could hit $100 billion by 2026
- Anticipated daily transaction volume of $50-100 billion on TRON network
- Focus on stablecoins like Tether and USDD
- Actively working to collaborate with institutions to bridge traditional finance
- Expects favorable regulatory environment to support growth
